title: Graves Smoke Screen bug (gameplay) with replay.gg

replies.body:
Hey Fritos1 - 

Replay.gg isn't something Riot owns/works on, so it's not something we support in terms of bug fixing. We only resolve issues that are in the League of Legends client, both in game, and our spectator mode. 

I'd hit up their bug report peeps - looks like their email is admin@replay.gg. ^-^
